love.question: Someone says "I miss you 😔" but {name} just stares at the screen. What's going through your mind?
love.englishHint: What do you think when someone misses you but you feel nothing?

options.text: "I don't feel anything, should I pretend?" 🎭
"Do I even miss people anymore?" 🤔
"Cute... but I need space." 🧊
"I wanna reply, but I just... don't." 📱

love.question: What's {name}'s idea of love these days?
love.englishHint: How do you currently view the concept of love?

options.text: Practical, respectful and chill. 🤝
Full of passion and chaos! 🔥
Something I'm not sure I believe in anymore. 🥀
Quiet companionship, no drama. 🧘

love.question: {name} is always texting first in a situationship. You...?
love.englishHint: What do you do when you're always initiating contact?

options.text: Stop. Let them miss you. 🛑
Keep texting — you crave closure. 📲
Ghost them back like a pro. 👻
Send a meme and emotionally detach. 🎮

love.question: {name} gets mixed signals from someone. Your usual response?
love.englishHint: How do you handle inconsistent behavior from potential partners?

options.text: Overthink every interaction for hidden meanings 🔍
Call them out directly - "What are we?" 📣
Match their energy - hot and cold right back 🧊🔥
Walk away - life's too short for confusion 👋

love.question: After years together, {name} realizes the spark is gone. You:
love.englishHint: How do you respond to a relationship that has lost its excitement?

options.text: Accept it as normal - real love isn't just excitement 🧠
Plan surprise dates to rekindle the flame 🔥
Wonder if you should just move on 🚶
Start overthinking if you ever truly felt anything 🤔

love.question: {name} reconnects with an ex. The first feeling is:
love.englishHint: What do you feel when unexpectedly connecting with a former partner?

options.text: Nothing - just like checking time on a broken clock ⏰
Nostalgic butterflies with caution tape around them 🦋
Mild curiosity, like watching a movie you've already seen 🎬
Clarity about how much you've both changed 🔍

friendship.question: {name}'s "best friend" talks only when they need help. You...?
friendship.englishHint: What do you do when friends only contact you for favors?

options.text: Help, but it stings. 💉
Play dumb. Let them chase. 🙃
Say "bro I'm not your backup charger." 🔋
Fade out slowly, no drama. 🌫️

friendship.question: Everyone made a group trip plan. {name} wasn't invited. You...?
friendship.englishHint: How do you react when excluded from group plans?

options.text: Laugh it off — you're used to it. 😂
Feel weirdly numb. 😶
Roast them in your head. 🔥
Make solo plans like a legend. 🌟

friendship.question: {name} realizes it's been months since you laughed hard with a friend.
friendship.englishHint: How do you feel when you notice you haven't had genuine fun with friends lately?

options.text: Maybe I've changed... 🦋
I just want one real friend. 🫂
Who cares? I'm too busy. 📅
This is getting sad 😶‍🌫️

friendship.question: {name}'s group chat is full of forwarded memes but no real talk. You:
friendship.englishHint: How do you handle superficial group conversations?

options.text: Keep it light, deep talk is overrated 🎭
Drop a personal question and see who responds 🎣
Leave on read, check back next week 👀
Try reaching out to one person privately 💬

friendship.question: {name} meets an old friend after years. The connection feels:
friendship.englishHint: How do reunions with old friends typically feel to you?

options.text: Awkward - we've become strangers with memories 👥
Nostalgic but shallow - can't recreate the past 📸
Surprisingly comfortable - true bonds never break 🔄
Interesting - comparing life paths like characters in a show 📺

friendship.question: {name} is social battery depleted but friends are texting. You:
friendship.englishHint: How do you handle social demands when emotionally drained?

options.text: Reply with minimal effort - one word answers 🔤
Say you're busy when you're just tired 🥱
Turn off notifications and recharge guilt-free 🔋
Force yourself to engage - FOMO is worse 😬

career.question: Everyone's rushing to succeed. {name} is...
career.englishHint: What's your approach to career advancement compared to others?

options.text: Taking my time — chill growth. 🌱
Vibing with zero guilt. 😎
Thinking a lot, doing little 😅
Building slow but solid. 🧱

career.question: A job interviewer asks "{name}, where do you see yourself in 5 years?" You say...?
career.englishHint: How do you respond to the classic 5-year plan question?

options.text: "With better snacks." 🍪
"Freelancing in my PJs." 🧦
"Hopefully…alive." 💀
"Running my own thing, duh." 💼

career.question: {name} wants to build an empire but hasn't opened your laptop in 2 days. You...?
career.englishHint: How do you handle procrastination despite big ambitions?

options.text: Tell myself I'm resting before greatness. 💤
Cry a little, scroll a lot. 📱
Say "mañana, baby." 🌴
Sketch it mentally and call it "planning." 🧠

career.question: When people brag about being busy 24/7, {name} thinks:
career.englishHint: What's your reaction to hustle culture?

options.text: "Weird flex but ok" - balance is better 🧘
"Maybe I should work harder?" *mild panic* 😰
"That's the dream!" - admire the grind 💯
"Sounds exhausting" - not my vibe 🥱

career.question: {name} got rejected from a job application. Your response?
career.englishHint: How do you handle career disappointments?

options.text: "Their loss" - confidence unshaken 💪
Analyze what went wrong for next time 🔍
Feel defeated but apply to 10 more anyway 📑
Question if this career path is even right 🤷

career.question: Colleagues are competitive but {name} is just vibing. This makes you feel:
career.englishHint: How do you feel about not participating in workplace competition?

options.text: Zen - my path is my own 🧘
Smart - watching them burn out while I chill 🧠
Occasionally insecure but mostly peaceful 🌊
Like I'm missing something important 😬

personality.question: People call {name} calm. But inside you're...?
personality.englishHint: What's your internal state compared to how others see you?

options.text: Screaming. Silently. 😱
Running 10 thoughts per second. 🏃‍♂️
Observing everything like a hawk. 🦅
Calm. For real. I promise. 😌

personality.question: {name} texts like a romantic poet but talks like a meme. What gives?
personality.englishHint: Why is there a disconnect between your written and spoken communication?

options.text: I switch depending on the vibe. 🔄
Online me = drama. Real me = shy. 🎭
It's all performance, babe. 🎬
I'm just built weird. 🤷

personality.question: What's {name}'s real 'default mood'?
personality.englishHint: How would you describe your baseline emotional state?

options.text: Tired but productive. 💻
Playful but deep. 🎮
Peaceful but overthinking. 🧘
Confused but confident. 😎

personality.question: {name} enters a room full of strangers. First instinct?
personality.englishHint: What's your immediate reaction in unfamiliar social settings?

options.text: Find a corner and observe the vibes 👀
Head to the snacks/drinks - strategic position 🍕
Introduce myself to someone - anxiety inside 🎭
Check phone, pretend I'm busy texting 📱

personality.question: {name} has 10 different hobbies but masters none. This makes you feel:
personality.englishHint: How do you feel about being a jack of all trades?

options.text: Versatile and interesting - life's too short to pick one 🌈
Scattered - wish I could focus on just one thing 🧩
It's not about mastery, it's about enjoyment 🎨
I'm collecting skills for my future masterpiece 🔮

personality.question: Someone describes {name} to others. They'd probably say you're:
personality.englishHint: How do you think others perceive your personality?

options.text: "Hard to read but worth the effort" 📖
"Different person every time you meet them" 🎭
"Surprisingly calm considering what's in their head" 🧠
"Fun but exhausting to keep up with" ⚡
